response.job_title: Technical Leader en Mercado Libre "Contratamos talento para democratizar el comercio, el dinero, y los pagos en Latam"
response.summary: 10 years experienced systems engineer on designing and implementing technology solutions in financial field following agile software development methodologies. Specialist in software engineering, certified as Senior System Architect and focus on enterprise process automation  supported on PEGA platform.
response.skills: Desarrollo de software, Pega PRPC, AngularJS, HTML5, SOAP, Scrum, Java EE, GitHub, Jenkins, PRPC de Pegasystems, HP Quality Center, JPA, Oracle Database, WebSphere Application Server, Servicios web de RESTful, HP QTP, JSF, Apache Subversion, Maven, Hudson

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
To Lead the support team for Global Wealth Management business Line for Scotiabank in Canada.
To Lead the Colombian PEGA tribe training Java developers to become PEGA developers.

Job Achievements:
Q Starts recognition of excellence for leading the PEGA tribe.
To create knowledge dojos to expand PEGA abilities across the compañy. 
To reduce the application  issues backlog by 30% compared with last year.
profile_positions.title: PEGA Solutions LEAD
PEGA Advanced App Engineering Assoc Manager

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Defining the information system architecture which supports the credit adjudication process on the region using PEGA platform (Region: Colombia, Mexico and Caribbean islands). 
•	Implementing development tasks using PEGA platform and using SCRUM methodology. 
•	Building automated test and quality reports using Selenium technology.
•	Defining, perform and maintain automated functional tests for the application using HP Loadrunner.
•	To manage source code repository and deliverable versions using GIT and Jenkins platforms. 
•	Supporting and managing non production environments and solution life cycle between them. 
•	Defining the integration with external systems and managing the external responsible team in each country

Job Achievements:
•	CSA and CSSA certification on PEGA platform.
•	First country first MVP delivered in 8 months.
•	Second country first MVP delivered in 3 months.
profile_positions.title: PEGA Senior System Architect on Sinfonía Project

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Defining the architecture for new business initiatives which affect the application.
•	Managing internal and external human talent responsible to implement technological changes to support business initiatives on the applications.
•	Coordinate automated functional and non functional tests performed by external teams.
•	To schedule maintenance and improvements activities for “Origenator” application.
•	Supporting application issues in production environment to assure the correct operation of it.

Job Achievements:
•	New mobile front creation for “Origenator” application using HTML5 and Angular technologies.
•	99,8 % production availability on “Origenator” application in production environment.
profile_positions.title: Technical leader for “Origenator” application

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Managing source code life cycle for critical information systems for the bank.
•	Defining, documenting and implementing the source control process and standards do it.
•	Choosing and supporting the versioning and deployment tools to be used.
•	Training the involved parties in the process and publish it for all the company.

Job Achievements:
•	Versioning the source control of 7 critical bank applications.
•	Creation of a standard versioning process for bank applications.
profile_positions.title: Source code versioning project Leader

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Choosing and supporting automated testing and load testing tools for the bank.
•	Auditing testing scenarios designs and implementations for automated testing.
•	Designing and performing the load and stress testing for bank transnational applications.

Job Achievements:
•	Acquiring HP suit for automated functional testing and load runner tool for load testing.
•	Creation of a policy which force all projects related with transnational applications must perform load and stress tests before to go to production environment.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Technical Leader

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Identifying security requirements and managing the implementations of them in order to achieve PCI DSS certification for the bank.
•	Analyzing the technical impact of the identified improvements and controls for each application assigned to me.
•	Design and manage the implementation of the selected alternative for each application assigned to me. 
•	Reviewing and evaluate the acceptance of the implementations according with the PCI DSS standard.
Job Achievements:
•	PCI DSS certification for the bank in all applications related with credit card.
•	Success implementation for at least 150 security controls and improvements in more than 60 applications.
profile_positions.title: PCI Project Technical Leader

profile_positions.description:
Job Functions:
•	Innovation consulting for future trends in financial field.

Job Achievements:
•	Being selected to start a long term contract for the bank.
profile_positions.title: University Pasant of Innovation

school.name: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas

company.name: Mercado Libre
company.description:
Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Mercado Libre is Latin America’s leading e-commerce technology company.  Through its primary platforms, MercadoLibre.com and MercadoPago.com, it provides solutions to individuals and companies buying, selling, advertising, and paying for goods online.    
Mercado Libe serves millions of users and creates a market for a wide variety of goods and services in an easy, safe and efficient way.  
MercadoLibre maintains a leadership position in 18 Latin American countries.  The Company listed on Nasdaq (NASDAQ: MELI) following its initial public offering in 2007.
